name: Handmade greeting cards
description:
Our greeting cards are handmade and blank on the inside, so go ahead and express yourself!  Weddings, birthdays, anniversaries, babies or just because.  Each card is unique so to give you an idea of our work the images posted display examples of previous cards sold.

Cards are 4x6 or 5x7 + matching envelope packaged in a clear plastic sleeve.  Standard postage is sufficient for those cards with embellishments, but to protect the card it is suggested that you write "please hand stamp" on the outside of the envelope.

name: Thank You notecard sets
description:
There is always a reason to be thankful.  Order a set (or two) so you always have a notecard handy!  Or give as a gift tucked inside a card caddy.  We currently have 3 designs in stock.

Purchase includes a set of 8 notecards + 8 envelopes.  All notecards are blank inside.

name: Simple Pleasure Notecards
description:
Each notecard reads "Nothing compares to the simple pleasure of a bike ride."  What's your simple pleasure?  A run, a hike, a swim?  We can customize these notecards with an activity and image of your choice. Additional fees may apply for custom design work.  

Set of 8 notecards + 8 envelopes.  Notecards are blank inside.

name: Card Caddy
description:
These caddies come in three different sizes - small, medium and large.  

The small caddy is perfect to carry business cards, money, photo ID or whatever else you can dream up.  They are also great to give as a gift card holder or to organize your own gift cards throughout the year!

The medium and large caddies are similar, the only variance is size.  The medium can hold several 4x6 cards or notecards and has a pocket to store stamps, a pen, address labels and important dates to remember.  The large caddy is the same, but is larger and can hold 5x7 cards.  You can also use the caddies to keep receipts organized, coupons for the errands you will run that day, photos, shopping lists...you name it!

name: a little love...notes
description:
The perfect way to give a little love to your AFP's (all-time favorite peeps)!

Each tin has 12 mini notes with sayings for you to customize.  Drop in your child's lunchbox wishing them a great day, slip in your spouse's suitcase so they know you are thinking of them while away on business or give a kudo to a co-worker for helping you on that big project!  

Examples:
Wishing you_________________
Happy_____________________
I love______________________ 

Notes can be customized and are available in Spanish upon request.
